name: docNxgres
description: simple application server, part of a three-container working template back end using Docker Compose and including an Nginx reverse proxy server & PostgreSQL database

scripts.compose:rm:c: docker rm app-server app-cache app-db app-proxy
scripts.compose:rm:ci: docker rm app-server app-cache app-db app-proxy && docker rmi docnxgres_server
scripts.compose:rm:cv: docker rm app-server app-cache app-db app-proxy && docker volume rm docnxgres_app-cache-data docnxgres_app-db-data
scripts.compose:rm:civ: docker rm app-server app-cache app-db app-proxy && docker rmi docnxgres_server && docker volume rm docnxgres_app-cache-data docnxgres_app-db-data
scripts.compose:ls: docker ps -a && docker images && docker volume ls
scripts.test:down: docker rm test-cache test-db && docker volume rm docnxgres_test-cache-data docnxgres_test-db-data

author: barcek
